title.narrative: Provision of expert advice, assistance to deliver Phase 1 of the Libya Security, Justice and Defence Programme

description.narrative: This activity (Provision of expert advice, assistance to deliver Phase 1 of the Libya Security, Justice and Defence Programme) is a component of Provision of expert assistance to deliver Phase 1 of the Libya Security, Justice and Defence Programme reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £2,599,000. This component benefits Libya, and works in the following sector(s): Civilian peace-building, conflict prevention and resolution. , with the following implementing partners: College of Policing, Crown Agents Limited, UK - Ministry of Defence. The start date is 01-04-2014 and the end date is 30-09-2014.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

sector.narrative: Civilian peace-building, conflict prevention and resolution

description.narrative: Justice, Law and Order - Justice, Law, Order and Security - Justice, Law and Order - demobilisation
